item.name: glass table
item.description: A three-legged table, all made of solid glass.

item.name: small chest
item.description: The small chest looks like it contains personal items. An inscription reads, "a gift from the caterpillar". The box needs a five letter code to unlock it.

item.name: murky pond
item.description: You inspect the murky pond. It looks like there is something at the bottom of the pond.
